entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 March 2023
